## DocumentResource.bulkDelete() method

Deletes multiple documents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bulkDelete(packageId: string, documentIds: string[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |
|  documentIds | string\[\] | ID of the documents to be deleted |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
